subject: Delegation of powers for approval of bids for award of works unde EPC/Item rate mode;OMT projects and Collection of User fee.
text: YRdl 7cly TTAIf xfech7u {H / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 71 WI (Tem 9ar- atr RTJTATT HATA) #T ?1 44 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) d-5 Qa 6, #4rr-10, GRUTI, T Frrl-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn: 8th April, 2013 POLICY MATTER ~ Technical (131/2013) (Decision taken in the 93rd Meeting of the Authority held on 26.3.2013) Sub: Delegation of powers for approval of bids for award of works under EPC/ltem rate mode, OMT projects and Collection of User fee: Following procedure has been approved by the Authority in its 93d Meeting held on 26.3.2013 for award of works Under EPCIltem rate mode, OMT Projects and collection of user fee: i) EPC/ltem Rate: The bids for award purpose will be approved by Chairman; NHAI if the response to the bid is adequate (more than 2 valid bids) and the amount quoted by the preferred bidder is not more than 10% of the estimated civil cost approved by the Competent Authority. ii) OMT Projects: The bids for award purpose will be approved by Chairman; NHAI, if the response to the bid is adequate (2 or more valid bids) and the auoted first year concession fee is upto 5% less than First Year concession Fee as at the time of SFC approval. b) In case single bid is received, the tender process may be cancelled and re-bidding done except in case where due to other reasons, like difficult conditions, law cind order etc: the response is expected to be poor: In case re-bidding also results in receipt of single bid, the proposal may be up to Board for consideration. Board may accept single bid after examining the reasonableness of the same. iii) Collection of User Fee: The bids for award purpose will be approved by Chairman; NHAI, if the response to the bid is adequate(2 or more valid bids) and the quoted amount is upto 59 less than the Annual Potential Collection (APC)' of the project: Contd...2/- NHAI New put
